topic: The King's Dumbest Death: Killed by His Own Table.

prompts.image_prompt: Retro 16-bit pixel art, SNES RPG cutscene style, limited color palette. Cinematic wide shot of a powerful Catfolk King (Charles VIII, dressed in opulent 15th-century French royal attire) standing dramatically next to a heavy, ornately carved wooden table in a medieval castle hall. The king looks serious and imposing. Dramatic lighting, visible large pixels. No text, no letters, no numbers, no signage, no subtitles, no UI.
prompts.video_prompt: Retro 16-bit pixel art, SNES RPG cutscene style, limited color palette. Loopable 3s clip. Cinematic medium shot of the Catfolk King (Charles VIII, 15th-century royal attire) standing next to a massive wooden table inside a dimly lit castle hall. Subtle micro handheld camera sway. 2.5D parallax shift between the polished floor (FG), the King (MG), and the stone wall tapestry (BG). Soft light flickers from unseen torchlight, casting moving shadows. The King subtly adjusts his velvet cloak, his tail twitches slightly, and his chest rises and falls with breathing. The loopable action is the King dramatically resting his hand on the table surface, gripping the edge firmly, then retracting it slightly. Visible large pixels. No text, no letters, no numbers, no signage, no subtitles, no UI.
